overview:
A highly motivated and effective technology leader with 15+ years of experience helping companies succeed by building and growing quality software products and teams. In-depth experience in a range of disciplines including software architecture, team management and leadership, business development, project management and operations in a variety of company sizes and structures. Industry experience includes wireless sensor, traditional and online advertising, media, entertainment, e-commerce and fulfillment systems, events management, geospatial, mobile and online services.

Accomplishments -Founder and CEO of GoToTags -Responsible for product definition, technical vision and leadership for several companies -Served as lead architect on many projects; responsible for the technical design and implementation quality. -8+ years of experience managing teams of architects, developers and testers. -Started and grew a successful UX and technology consulting agency to 100+ consultants. -Founded and built an online start-up focused on adventure sports and travel. -Hands-on experience with all major technology stacks -Direct experience developing products for the web, desktop, mobile and home entertainment devices. -Participated in several due diligence analysisâ€™s for the acquisition of technology companies. -Author of several innovative technology patents. -Author of several blogs, videos and white papers focusing on software engineering design and processes. -Cultivated and maintain a network of top-performing individuals and partners across the US West coast.
